properties.title: Musée Suisse du Blé et du Pain
properties.abstract: Located in a vast cereal cultivating area, the House of Wheat and Bread in Echallens is a museum, a bread workshop and a bakery. This small, lively museum exhibits objects used for wheat cultivation and bread-making over the 8,000 years of its history.
properties.description:
Wheat and its history are presented in the House of Wheat and Bread in Echallens, a unique museum dedicated to agriculture, milling and baking. On three floors, this small but lively museum presents the wonderful story of wheat and bread over the 8,000 years of its history. Moreover, the Association Cantonale du Costume Vaudois exhibits a beautiful collection of traditional garments worn in the Lake Geneva Region.

Our friend «Ti'Grain» shares its fascinating adventures to the delight of the children who visit with their family or their school.
properties.name: Echallens région Tourisme
